section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the judgment and opinion of the Court to announce on behalf of Mr. Justice Powell who is unavoidably absent today, an opinion written and signed by him in 78-1006, Brown, the Secretary of Defense against Glines.
And for reasons stated in an opinion filed with the clerk this morning, the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals of the Ninth Circuit is reversed.
Mr. Justice Brennan filed a dissenting opinion.
Mr. Justice Stewart filed a separate dissenting opinion in which Mr. Justice Brennan joined.
Mr. Justice Stevens also filed a dissenting opinion.
Mr. Justice Marshall took no part in the consideration or the decision of this case.
